London Working At Heights Refresher (October 7, 2024)

October 7 @ 8:30 am - 12:30 pm

CDN $95.00
  • « Working At Heights (October 5, 2024)
  • Mobile Elevated Work Platform – Operator (October 8 ,2024) »

Program Length – 4 hours – 8:30 am – 12:30 PM
Course Fees – $95.00 + HST

Working at heights training is valid for three (3) years from the date of successful completion of the original Chief Prevention Officer (CPO) approved program. All learners who wish to maintain the validity of their working at heights training past this three year period need to successfully complete refresher training.

The refresher training also will update learners on any legislative, regulatory or equipment (technological) changes, which may impact working at heights in construction.

 

Working at Heights Practical Equipment Module

  • Barriers and Safety Nets
  • Personal Fall Protection Equipment
  • Anchor Points
  • Work Positioning Systems
  • Work Access Equipment and Platforms
  • Rescue Planning

**PREREQUISITES REQUIRED:

Learners must have successfully completed a full-day CPO approved Working at Heights program

CPO Learners # is required.

No refunds will be provided for registrants that do not meet prerequisites.

In the event that a learner has lost their CPO-issued proof of completion card, the learners can request a replacement card by calling the Ministry of Labour at 1-877-202-0008

Evaluation and Proof of Completion
All participants will be required to complete and pass a written test with a minimum mark of 75% and a practical test with a mark of 100%. Proof of completion will be provided.

Required: Photo I.D must be present at the beginning of class. Proper footwear is required, no open toe shoes or high heeled shoes allowed. If you do not meet these requirements, Mentor can refuse you access to the classroom and you will not receive a refund.

Accommodations
Accommodations available upon request.

Note: Group sessions can be booked either at our training location in London, Niagara or at your location. Contact Mentor Safety for details.

Tickets

The numbers below include tickets for this event already in your cart. Clicking "Get Tickets" will allow you to edit any existing attendee information as well as change ticket quantities.
Tickets are no longer available
